mapper.select: select * from User order by user_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into User(user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_nickname, roadAddrPart1, addrDetail, zipNo, user_email, user_tel) values(#{user_id}, #{user_passwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{roadAddrPart1}, #{addrDetail}, #{zipNo}, #{user_email}, #{user_tel})
